title: feat: generalize OpenClaw page and add to news/apps
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: The Claw is for everyone
gist.blurb: OpenClaw has graduated from a hackathon experiment to a full-fledged integration guide. Come see how to grab the best AI features for your app!
gist.summary: Reframed the OpenClaw project page from a temporary hackathon site into a permanent general integration guide.
gist.impact: Developers now have a centralized resource for understanding OpenClaw integrations beyond the original event context.
gist.visual_concept: OpenClaw represents a claw machine or grabbing mechanism. The change transforms it into a guide. Visual: The Pollinations Bee interacting with a friendly, cozy arcade claw machine that is handing out a book/scroll instead of a toy.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot standing next to a tiny, friendly retro arcade claw machine in a garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender gradient background. The claw machine is gently lowering a pixelated book labeled 'GUIDE' to the bee. The main character is a cute pixel art bee mascot with a yellow body and dark brown horizontal stripes, small black legs, two black antennae, black vertical oval eyes, bright pink rectangular blush marks on cheeks, a small happy smile, and small rounded light blue translucent wings. She wears a tiny mechanic's cap. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'OPENCLAW'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
